name: Tranform Drifto: Colega Saga Resurrection
description:
Whoa buddy, you survived the gran canyon?

Don't worry, we have more LSD.

From the creators of the most dislectically titled game in itch.io. TRANFORM DRIFTO. The second part arrives:

After your LSD trip in the gran canyon, you arrive back to your city just to realize it's 2077, and you're trapped in an arcade 1990s nokia mobile snake type game that will try to make you run out of space to drive.  Oh shit what? The nokia spirit doesn't let you slow down your car?! What else can you do but drive? 

Purpose? Unknown. The tofu must be off date by now.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sinni & Dio minigames mega enterprise sponsored by Fas3 reminds you to:

DO NOT CONSUME DRUGS AND DRIVE. Specially outside of the virtual world. Inside? We never coded anything to check, take that as you wish.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS  :

A & D - Steering

Space - Accelerating.

Left Shift - Drift.

Tab - Change perspective.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to:

graduisc for the Doge Model 

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/swole-doge-7e68c66807d74a90b54128af100c6dcb

By Nova_hl ae86 amazing model

https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-toyota-ae86-blender-rigged-model-1771522

Music: 

【東方Eurobeat】センヲコエテ『A-ONE』

【Touhou Arrange】[ A-ONE ] Spider's Blood

MAD DESIRE - Stephy Martini

Free My Heart - Odyssey [EUROBEAT]

T Stebbins - Time Will Tell

All asset above where made by other people before the jam.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tranform Drifto: Colega Saga Resurrections is developed by Luis "Sinnicall" Martínez and Amadeo "Dio" Delgado. As co-founders of Fas3 we are related to it. However this game is merely a passion minigame and in no form represents the commercial product or activity of Fas3 Estudios S.L.
